</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 239 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 340 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a piercing or slashing melee weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Weapons with wounding runes are said to thirst for blood. When you hit a creature with a wounding weapon, you deal an extra 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
